                                                            ä¸Šé¢çš„æ•…äº‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯ä¹è§‚é”ï¼Œå°ç‹ä¿å­˜ä»·æ ¼å‰ï¼Œä¼šæ£€æŸ¥ä¸‹ä»·æ ¼æ˜¯å¦è¢«äººä¿®æ”¹è¿‡äº†ã€‚å¦‚æœè¢«ä¿®æ”¹è¿‡äº†ï¼Œåˆ™é‡æ–°å–å‡ºçš„è¢«ä¿®æ”¹åçš„ä»·æ ¼ï¼Œ150å…ƒï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä»–ä¼šå°†120å…ƒå­˜å…¥æ•°æ®åº“ã€‚

                                                            # c>æ¨¡æ‹Ÿä¿®æ”¹å†²çª

                                                            • æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­å¢åŠ å•†å“è¡¨

                                                              CREATE TABLE t_product ( 
    id BIGINT(20) NOT NULL COMMENT 'ä¸»é”®ID', 
    NAME VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'å•†å“åç§°', 
    price INT(11) DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'ä»·æ ¼', 
    VERSION INT(11) DEFAULT 0 COMMENT 'ä¹è§‚é”ç‰ˆæœ¬å·', 
    PRIMARY KEY (id) 
);

                                                            • æ·»åŠ ä¸€æ¡æ•°æ®

                                                              INSERT INTO t_product (id, NAME, price) VALUES (1, 'å¤–æ˜Ÿäººç¬”è®°æœ¬', 100);

                                                            • æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå®ä½“ç±»Product

                                                              @Data
public class Product {
    private Long id;
    private String name;
    private Integer price;
    private Integer version;
}

                                                            • æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªMapperæ¥å£ProductMapper

                                                              public interface ProductMapper extends BaseMapper<Product> {}

                                                            • æµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•

                                                              @Test
public void testProduct01(){
    //1.å°æè·å–å•†å“ä»·æ ¼
    Product productLi = productMapper.selectById(1);
    System.out.println("å°æè·å–çš„å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ä¸ºï¼š" + productLi.getPrice());

    //2.å°ç‹è·å–å•†å“ä»·æ ¼
    Product productWang = productMapper.selectById(1);
    System.out.println("å°æè·å–çš„å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ä¸ºï¼š" + productWang.getPrice());

    //3.å°æä¿®æ”¹å•†å“ä»·æ ¼+50
    productLi.setPrice(productLi.getPrice()+50);
    productMapper.updateById(productLi);

    //4.å°ç‹ä¿®æ”¹å•†å“ä»·æ ¼-30
    productWang.setPrice(productWang.getPrice()-30);
    productMapper.updateById(productWang);

    //5.è€æ¿æŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“ä»·æ ¼
    Product productBoss = productMapper.selectById(1);
    System.out.println("è€æ¿è·å–çš„å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ä¸ºï¼š" + productBoss.getPrice());
}

                                                              # d>ä¹è§‚é”å®ç°æµç¨‹

                                                              æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­æ·»åŠ versionå­—æ®µ

                                                              å–å‡ºè®°å½•æ—¶ï¼Œè·å–å½“å‰version

                                                              SELECT id,`name`,price,`version` FROM product WHERE id=1

                                                              æ›´æ–°æ—¶ï¼Œversion + 1ï¼Œå¦‚æœwhereè¯­å¥ä¸­çš„versionç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸å¯¹ï¼Œåˆ™æ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥

                                                              UPDATE product SET price=price+50, `version`=`version` + 1 WHERE id=1 AND `version`=1

                                                            # 3.4 mybatispluså®ç°ä¹è§‚é”

                                                            • å®ä½“ç±»versionå­—æ®µæ·»åŠ æ³¨è§£@Version

                                                              @Data
public class Product {
    private Long id;
    private String name;
    private Integer price;
    @Version
    private Integer version;
}

                                                            • æ·»åŠ ä¹è§‚é”æ’ä»¶é…ç½®

      class="com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.plugins.inner.OptimisticLockerInnerInt erceptor"></bean>

                                                            • å†æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œæµ‹è¯•æ–¹æ³•

                                                              å°ææŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

                                                              â€‹ SELECT id,name,price,version FROM t_product WHERE id=?

                                                              å°ç‹æŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

                                                              â€‹ SELECT id,name,price,version FROM t_product WHERE id=?

                                                              å°æä¿®æ”¹å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨å°†version+1

                                                              â€‹ UPDATE t_product SET name=?, price=?, version=? WHERE id=? AND version=?

                                                              â€‹ Parameters: å¤–æ˜Ÿäººç¬”è®°æœ¬(String), 150(Integer), 1(Integer), 1(Long), 0(Integer)

                                                              å°ç‹ä¿®æ”¹å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶versionå·²æ›´æ–°ï¼Œæ¡ä»¶ä¸æˆç«‹ï¼Œä¿®æ”¹å¤±è´¥

                                                              â€‹ UPDATE t_product SET name=?, price=?, version=? WHERE id=? AND version=?

                                                              â€‹ Parameters: å¤–æ˜Ÿäººç¬”è®°æœ¬(String), 70(Integer), 1(Integer), 1(Long), 0(Integer)

                                                              æœ€ç»ˆï¼Œå°ç‹ä¿®æ”¹å¤±è´¥ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢ä»·æ ¼ï¼š150

                                                              â€‹ SELECT id,name,price,version FROM t_product WHERE id=?

                                                            • ä¼˜åŒ–æ‰§è¡Œæµç¨‹

                                                              @Test
public void testProduct01(){
    //1.å°æè·å–å•†å“ä»·æ ¼
    Product productLi = productMapper.selectById(1);
    System.out.println("å°æè·å–çš„å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ä¸ºï¼š" + productLi.getPrice());

    //2.å°ç‹è·å–å•†å“ä»·æ ¼
    Product productWang = productMapper.selectById(1);
    System.out.println("å°æè·å–çš„å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ä¸ºï¼š" + productWang.getPrice());

    //3.å°æä¿®æ”¹å•†å“ä»·æ ¼+50
    productLi.setPrice(productLi.getPrice()+50);
    productMapper.updateById(productLi);

    //4.å°ç‹ä¿®æ”¹å•†å“ä»·æ ¼-30
    productWang.setPrice(productWang.getPrice()-30);
    int result = productMapper.updateById(productWang);
    if(result == 0){
        //æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œé‡è¯•
        Product productNew = productMapper.selectById(1);
        productNew.setPrice(productNew.getPrice()-30);
        productMapper.updateById(productNew);
    }

    //5.è€æ¿æŸ¥è¯¢å•†å“ä»·æ ¼
    Product productBoss = productMapper.selectById(1);
    System.out.println("è€æ¿è·å–çš„å•†å“ä»·æ ¼ä¸ºï¼š" + productBoss.getPrice());
}
